changes.before:
style={{ cursor: onClick ? 'pointer' : 'default' }}
style={{ width: `${containerSize}px`, height: `${containerSize}px`, backgroundColor: backgroundColor, padding: `${padding}px` }}
changes.reason: Remove inline styles to comply with Xibalba component system. Cursor converted to className, dynamic values use CSS custom properties (correct pattern).
testCases: XIBALBA-LOGOMARK-002: Cursor changes on hover when onClick provided
changes.rollbackPlan: Revert commit CHG-2025-12-27-001 or restore from git history

metadata.purpose: Track all inline style removal changes with full context for rollback and impact analysis
metadata.format: Each change record includes before/after code, dependencies, affected pages, test cases, and rollback plan
